Public Member Functions

DdMd::BondPotential Class Reference

Detailed Description

An BondPotential calculates bond forces and energies for a parent Simulation.

All operations in this class are local (no MPI).

Definition at line 29 of file ddMd/potentials/bond/BondPotential.h.

#include <BondPotential.h>
